About Raphael

Raphael Corwyn McGennis is the youngest son of Caleb Michael McGennis and Stephanie Kay McGennis, growing up in Jefferson City, Missouri as part of one of the city's most notable families.

Raphael is being raised with strong family values, entrepreneurial spirit, and community engagement that defines the McGennis family legacy in Central Missouri.
